title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: Label font size doesn't change right away it is modified.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label and edit its font size as "18 points".
2.
OB: The label height is not changed immediately after modifying the font size in the UI.
EB: The label height should update automatically after modifying the font size in the UI.
SR:
Follow these steps to reproduce the issue:
1. Add a label.
2. Modify the font size of the label to "18 points".
3. Observe that the label height does not change accordingly.
